#summary Guidelines for morphological analyzer

Clear morphological analyzer converts word-forms to their base-forms.  For example, all plural nouns are converted to their singular forms and all  currently supports only English.  More languages will be supported sometime in future.
<br><br>

== How to run Clear morphological analyzer ==

{{{
java clear.engine.MorphAnalyze -i <input file> -o <output file>
}}}

== Input file format ==

 * FORM
 * POSTAG
<br>

== Output file format ==

 * FORM
 * POSTAG
